description: Try our easy to follow Coleslaw Reuben Sandwiches recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Coleslaw Reuben Sandwiches Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook sandwiches in the heated sandwich press for about 810 minutes or until golden and heated through. Serve with dill cucumbers.
